column2: So much death. So many endings.
All of us are ending, within and without.
We're meeting our end if we don't move.
It's time to move! Group up for a fight.
I'll not disagree! Have at it!
These interstellar medusozoa are 90% liquid, like a watermelon. Most of that liquid is highly corrosive to the touch.
Touching or ingesting these excretions is neither recommended, or encouraged, by the Republic.
Blood mixes with ichor: a sacramental intercession.
...it also notably can have hallucinogenic properties.
Truth can solely be found in our senses. Hallucination as divination.
My third and fifth sons are quite the fan of watermelons, you know.
